root_causes.analysis: Low IC (0.030) indicates weak signal; Low hit rate (48.00%) suggests poor signal quality
root_causes.recommendation: Improve signal quality, add regime filters, or use volatility normalization

root_causes.analysis: Factor experiences large losses during adverse periods
root_causes.recommendation: Implement position sizing, stop-loss, or volatility targeting

root_causes.analysis: Excessive trading will erode returns due to transaction costs
root_causes.recommendation: Reduce rebalance frequency or add holding period constraint

root_causes.analysis: Signal has weak predictive power for future returns
root_causes.recommendation: Add more signals, improve signal construction, or combine multiple primitives
